header: Easily add dynamic personalization to your experience, using just your product data.
body:
My Style Genie’s Unified Commerce personalization engine offers dynamic ensemble recommendations based on artificial intelligence, enriched product data and consumer engagement.

Empowering consumers and sales associates alike, MSG just jolted the shopping journey with a sophisticated “digital smart stylist” enabling retailers to now personalize the shopping experience without getting too personal. Our powerful ground breaking technology delivers recommendations tailored to a consumer’s objectives and preferences while increasing basket size, maximizing margin and keeping conversations flowing.

Click the Enable button to activate My Style Genie in your experience. Simple integration will enable you to incorporate this cutting edge technology into your experience in a matter of days.More information available at Xomni.MyStyleGenie.com.
